attributes.action: save the Green Belt land in North Hertfordshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A plan known as the Core Strategy has been released for Public Consultation, by Luton & South Beds Joint Planning Committee (JPC), that includes proposals to build over 5,500 homes, and a 4-lane highway linking the A505 to the A6 on Green Belt land in North Hertfordshire to the immediate east of Luton. Destroying over 10,000 hectares of prime countryside, the equivalent of 20,000 football pitches.
This is in contravention of government policy to protect areas of natural outstanding beauty.
